title: Michael Jackson's Ghosts (Patreon Clip)
itunes:title: Michael Jackson's Ghosts (Patreon Clip)
itunes:subtitle: Here's a preview of our all-new Patreon exclusive episode that finds the Losers moonwalking back to 1996 to discuss Stephen King and Michael Jackson's spooktacular short film, Ghosts. Want more? Head on over to www.patreon.com/thebarrens...
description:
Here's a preview of our all-new Patreon exclusive episode that finds the Losers moonwalking back to 1996 to discuss Stephen King and Michael Jackson's spooktacular short film, Ghosts. Want more? Head on over to www.patreon.com/thebarrens and become a Patron for more exclusive bonus content.


Follow us on Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Patreon


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
